title: Live criteria updates not wired up - functions exist but never called
description: The live progress update infrastructure exists (fswatch, FIFO, _ralph_poll_updates, _ralph_handle_file_change, _ralph_update_criteria_display) but _ralph_handle_file_change is never called in the main loop. The criteria progress bar never updates during iteration execution.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Add polling loop that calls _ralph_poll_updates() during Claude execution
Criteria progress bar updates in-place when story JSON changes
Stories progress bar updates when index.json changes
Test: Run ralph-status in another terminal, watch criteria count increment
Use background subshell or timeout-based polling during 'claude' command
Don't block the main iteration execution
